Why Gorilla Tech

Techs Available Now

925-628-1328

Clear & Simple Pricing

Save a minimum of 50% and up to 85% off Geek Squad or the Apple Store with Gorilla Tech.

Real Time Booking

Gorilla Techs are available to come to your home or office. Call or Book Online! We are local Bay Area experts.

100% Satisfaction Guarantee

If you are not completely satistied with your appointment, we will send a Tech to help you free of charge or refund your money. Simple!

Professional Techs

Our Gorilla Techs are professionally trained and groomed for the Gorilla Way! We vet all of the Tech's identity with background checks.

Servicing San Francisco & The East Bay

Gorilla Tech provides on demand computer & mobile tech help throughout San Francisco, Alameda and Contra Costa County. We support Windows, Mac, Android, iPhones, iPads, home automation like Ring Doorbells, Nest Thermostat and August Doorbell locks.

Book Appointment Today

Computer Repair

When something goes wrong with your computer and you don't know what the issue is or how to fix it, Gorilla Tech is here to help.

Printer Install/Fix

We take the aches and pains of installing and synching your devices to your wired or wireless printer. Once setup, our techs will teach you how to operate your printer like an expert.

Internet, WiFi Install/Fix

With our WiFi setup/fix service, you can take advantage of all the conveniences that wireless has to offer. Tired of waiting for your song to download or that Netflix show keeps stopping.

Smart Phones & Tablets

Let us show you how to become a power user on your new shiny smartphone or tablet. Our Techs can help you setup your email, install apps and configure your device to your needs.

Smart Home Installs

Make your home a Smart Home. Whether you have a smart lock, camera, lightbulbs or coffee maker, Gorilla Tech will get you connected and make your home the talk of your neighborhood!

Solid State Upgrades

Mac and Windows computers are great, but they can be AWESOME by upgrading them with newer Solid State Drives. Our Techs can backup your current system and reload it on a new and faster SSD. You will get back to where you left off in no time!
